insert into sys_permission (id, name, comment, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, enable) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sys_permission set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, comment, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, enable from sys_permission
